It's an unhinged one," said Jim Cantiello about the entertaining, unpredictable shenanigans pulled out by Steven Tyler in the first two nights of audition episodes this week. Truth be told, I never realized how much I missed Paula[ Abdul] last year. Steven Tyler 's colorful language, zany metaphors and deafening jangly man-jewelry was just the entertaining wild card the two-night premiere needed to give it a must-see facelift.
